item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. From where I left (807 points | 285 comments)
2. GM exits robotaxi market, will bring Cruise operations in house (192 points | 245 comments)
3. Electric (Postgres sync engine) beta release (83 points | 17 comments)
4. The Google Willow Thing (509 points | 230 comments)

7. U.S. math scores drop on major international test (215 points | 409 comments)
8. Alzheimer's study shows ketone bodies help clear misfolded proteins (74 points | 28 comments)

10. Running Durable Workflows in Postgres Using DBOS (118 points | 34 comments)
11. Training LLMs to Reason in a Continuous Latent Space (191 points | 61 comments)

14. Boltzmann brain (93 points | 73 comments)

22. The Depths of Wikipedians (158 points | 51 comments)
23. Digital consumption keeps me from getting better at my job (213 points | 75 comments)
24. WPEngine, Inc. vs. Automattic– Order on Motion for Preliminary Injunction (162 points | 58 comments)
25. Show HN: Holos – Configure Kubernetes with CUE data structures instead of YAML (52 points | 27 comments)
26. The Most Expensive Eating Disorder (67 points | 49 comments)
27. AMD's trusted execution environment blown wide open by new BadRAM attack (120 points | 27 comments)
28. Google says AI weather model masters 15-day forecast (138 points | 118 comments)
29. Show HN: Hyperbrowser – Scalable Browser Infrastructure for AI Apps (35 points | 23 comments)
30. From Unemployment to Lisp: Running GPT-2 on a Teen's Deep Learning Compiler (98 points | 3 comments)
